channel.title: Need help on how to get my server online! some problems! :\
channel.description: Can someone tell me about how to get my server online.. I've got my portforwarding down, and my ip.. but yet whenever my friends try to load the server, it doesnt connect and the clients screen wont load..

item.title: Need help on how to get my server online! some problems! :\
item.dc:creator: @Brazil_pkr10 Brazil pkr10
item.description:
@Brazil_pkr10 wrote:

go to your site adress area and do http://127.0.0.1:(your ip entrance in case should be 895 if not 43594 or 5555) or another IP which you have and check if the port is 43594.
There are tutorials to Portforwarding correctly, the easyest one is with Utorrent ( i did this one in 1 minute ).If you are using Utorrent you have to first Run your server then Run Utorrent and let it on all the time!
Do you have no-ip? If yes, be sure the IP you gave them is correct with all the letters, if not, be sure all the numbers are correct.
If you using hamachi be sure they have the right IP too.

I can only help this way, if it still DOESNT work with Utorrent which is the best one then i dont know, sorry.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on how to get my server online! some problems! :\
